# Longchamp LIFF Project

This project has been created successfully with the following structure:

## Files Created

- **index.html** - Main LIFF application page
- **app.js** - LIFF SDK initialization and app logic
- **style.css** - Application styling
- **package.json** - Node.js dependencies and scripts
- **README.md** - Comprehensive documentation

## Quick Start

1. Open `/Users/Palm/Work/longchampTest` in VS Code
2. Run `npm install` to install dependencies
3. Update `app.js` with your LIFF ID (get it from LINE Developers Console)
4. Run `npm run dev` to start development server
5. Open `http://localhost:8000` in your browser

## Next Steps

1. Create a channel at [LINE Developers Console](https://developers.line.biz/console)
2. Create a LIFF app to get your LIFF ID
3. Replace `YOUR_LIFF_ID_HERE` in `app.js` with your LIFF ID
4. Deploy the app to a web server
5. Set the endpoint URL in LINE Developers Console

For detailed setup instructions, see README.md in the project folder.
